scenes.title: Homepage Exploration
scenes.narration: The Faire homepage welcomes us with an inviting message. Let's explore the navigation.

scenes.title: Searching & Filtering
scenes.narration: Let's search for 'coffee'. We can filter our results by various criteria.

scenes.title: Product Listing & Reviews
scenes.narration: The search results show a variety of coffee products. Let's check the reviews on this item.

scenes.title: Adding to Cart
scenes.narration: We can quickly add products to our cart. Let's add this coffee.

scenes.title: Cart Preview
scenes.narration: Our cart provides a preview of the selected item. We can adjust the quantity here.

coverage: This demo showcases the website's navigation, search functionality, product reviews, and cart interactions. Users can explore categories, filter products, read reviews, and make selections for their store.
assumptions: Interest in wholesale shopping for retail stores
risks: Some product categories might have limited or no stock
Users might require more time to read through extensive product listings or reviews

segments.text: Welcome to Faire, an exclusive platform for retail stores to source products. Let's dive into the diverse categories, starting with the homepage.
Here we have easy access to bestsellers, women-owned brands, and specialized categories like drinkware and skincare products.
Let's initiate a search for 'coffee' and explore the filtering options. We can sort by price, popularity, and more.
The search results provide a comprehensive view of coffee products. We can check detailed reviews to ensure we're selecting the right items.
Adding items to our cart is straightforward. We'll give it a quick glance before proceeding.
We can confirm and adjust the cart items. Faire makes wholesale shopping efficient and seamless.
